overview:
## Discussion

Each `GeometricPins` for an[doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Entity] have unique names. Adding a pin with the same name as another overrides the duplicate.

# name

**Instance Property**

The name of the pin.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String
```

## Discussion

Each `GeometricPins` for an[doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Entity] have unique names. Adding a pin with the same name as another overrides the duplicate.
title: name
